name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 日本武道館 Live ＂SuperNova＂ [_o_mtN68KEg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei performs 'Bibbidiba' at her Nippon Budokan live concert 'SuperNova'.
Instrumental interlude and visual montage showcasing highlights and a digital 'GHOST' title card.
Hoshimachi Suisei performs 'GHOST' with a live band.

subtitles.original: こんがらがってもチョー可愛いから
subtitles.english: Even if you're all mixed up, you're super cute

subtitles.original: 正気じゃいられない
subtitles.english: I can't stay sane

subtitles.original: BIBBIDI BOOWA BIBBIDI BOOWA
subtitles.english: BIBBIDI BOOWA BIBBIDI BOOWA

subtitles.original: こんな明日どないならば
subtitles.english: If tomorrow's like this, then...

subtitles.original: 急にどたまカチでしょう
subtitles.english: Suddenly, my head's gonna snap

subtitles.original: 0と1で構成された　意味のない Lights
subtitles.english: Meaningless lights composed of zeros and ones

subtitles.original: 誰にも見せないままで
subtitles.english: Keeping them hidden from everyone

subtitles.original: 天蓋　孤独　濁らせて歌い出せ
subtitles.english: Canopy, solitude, let them cloud over and start singing

subtitles.original: In case I don't see you, 夢に出てきてあげる
subtitles.english: In case I don't see you, I'll appear in your dreams

subtitles.original: 歪んでいる復讐心も今笑ってあげる
subtitles.english: I'll laugh away even that warped vengeful heart now

subtitles.original: 妄想じゃないの　だってあなたとほら
subtitles.english: It's not a delusion, because look, with you...

subtitles.original: Tu-lu-lu-lu-lu
subtitles.english: Tu-lu-lu-lu-lu

subtitles.original: 衝撃の最前線　毒を食らわばイイイ
subtitles.english: At the front lines of impact, if you're going to eat poison, eat it all

subtitles.original: 処すもの　されるもの　全部壊して
subtitles.english: Those who judge and those who are judged, break it all down

subtitles.original: 暴れまくってぶち込め
subtitles.english: Go wild and throw it all in

subtitles.original: 彗星の如く現れたスターの原石！バーチャルアイドルの星街すいせいです！
subtitles.english: A star in the making that appeared like a comet! I'm virtual idol Hoshimachi Suisei!

subtitles.original: すいちゃーーーん！？
subtitles.english: Sui-chaーーn!?

subtitles.original: 革命の準備　終わらせるスキップ
subtitles.english: Preparations for revolution, a skip to end it all

subtitles.original: 乗り越える肝は　怖くないスケープ
subtitles.english: The key to getting over it is an escape without fear

subtitles.original: Shubi-dubi-dubi-dubi-dubi-du... Voice to the Grave!
subtitles.english: Shubi-dubi-dubi-dubi-dubi-du... Voice to the Grave!

subtitles.original: 君も君も　濁ってる復讐心も抱きしめてあげる
subtitles.english: You, and you too, I'll embrace even your clouded vengeful hearts

subtitles.original: 妄想じゃないの　だってあなたとほら
subtitles.english: It's not a delusion, because look, with you...

subtitles.original: Tu-lu-lu-lu-lu
subtitles.english: Tu-lu-lu-lu-lu

subtitles.original: 想像の先だって　楽しそうに歌う
subtitles.english: Even beyond imagination, I sing happily

subtitles.original: 嘘じゃない　濁ってる復讐心も
subtitles.english: It's no lie, even those clouded vengeful hearts

subtitles.original: 何万回と再生した　希望の救済
subtitles.english: Salvation of hope, replayed tens of thousands of times

subtitles.original: 居るべき場所　意義　意味　有象無象みんな探してる
subtitles.english: A place to belong, significance, meaning, everyone is searching amidst the masses

subtitles.original: 手のひらに答えがなけりゃ
subtitles.english: If the answer isn't in the palm of your hand...

subtitles.original: Boom Out! 関係ない　奏でようさあ
subtitles.english: Boom Out! It doesn't matter, come on, let's play

subtitles.original: 君も君も　濁ってる復讐心も今笑ってあげる
subtitles.english: You, and you too, I'll laugh away even those clouded vengeful hearts now

subtitles.original: 妄想じゃないの　だってあなたとほら
subtitles.english: It's not a delusion, because look, with you...

subtitles.original: Tu-lu-lu-lu-lu
subtitles.english: Tu-lu-lu-lu-lu

subtitles.original: 正教じゃない　理論だって間違いだ
subtitles.english: It's not orthodox, even the theories are wrong

subtitles.original: 嘘じゃない　あれもこれも愛ゆえでしょう
subtitles.english: It's no lie, all of this must be because of love

subtitles.original: 濁ってる復讐心も抱きしめてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll embrace even your clouded vengeful hearts
